room_title: Escape room "National Treasures" by Axxiom Escape Rooms Rehoboth in Rehoboth Beach
review: We had so much fun!! The National Treasure room was just challenging enough. The staff was wonderful and helpful. Thanks for such a fun event!

room_title: Escape room "National Treasures" by Axxiom Escape Rooms Rehoboth in Rehoboth Beach
review: We made Nicolas Cage proud by beating the National Treasure challenge. My family and I beat the challenge with 7:26 left on the clock. The whole adventure was a lot of fun and challenging; we will most likely come back for another challenge!

room_title: Escape room "National Treasures" by Axxiom Escape Rooms Rehoboth in Rehoboth Beach
review: We totally bombed Boardwalk Empire, but we KILLED it with National Treasure! Katie convinced us to do a second run, and we beat it with one minute to go! Was super fun, definitely not what I expected, it was even better. We'll be back for the new rooms when they're added!
